#summary Tree-like representation of the most relevant routines

= Introduction =

This is a quick and general overview of the most relevant functions used in BioPatRec

== Signal Treatment ==
 * Signal pre-processing (pb_preProcessing, GUI_SigTreatment)
  * Split_recSession_Mov
  * Split_recSession_Ch
  * RemoveTrasient_cTp (returns [sigTreated])
  * AddRestAsMovement

 * TreatData 
  * ApplyFilters
   * [Filters]
  * GetData
 * GetAllSigFeatures (returns [sigFeatures])

== PatRec ==

* OfflinePatRec
 * Rand_sigFeatures
 * GetSets_Stack...
 * Normalize_TrV
 * Creates ([PatRec_Topologies])
 * OfflinePatRecTraining
  * xTraining routines (MLP, LDA, etc...)
 * [Accuracy_patRec]
  * NormalizeSet
  * OneShotPatRecClassifier
   * Calls ([[PatRec Topologies]])
    * OneShotPatRec
     * xTest routines

* RealtimePatRec
 * [[SignalProcessing_RealtimePatRec]]
  * ApplyFilters
  * GetSigFeatures
  * NormalizeSet
 * OneShotPatRecClassifier
   * Calls ([[PatRec Topologies]])
    * OneShotPatRec
     * xTest routines
